name: Between the Lines: Prologue
description:
A fading soul loses consciousness and finds himself in an unfamiliar and hostile land that's host to a war between Letters and Numbers.

Between the Lines: Prologue is the first part of a point-and-click adventure game that was originally designed for the "$106 Adventure Game Challenge" game jam.  This game sees the main character, a punctuation mark, stuck in the middle of a struggle between the Commonwealth of Letters and the Confederation of the Nine. Being an outsider as a punctuation mark, the main character must try to find their place in  a strange world in which letters and numbers are struggling for supremacy.

Enjoy!

Commonwealth of Letters Confederation of the Nine
